full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): NO TITLE [@002A *, ,RANG GI SPYI BOR SENG KHRI PAD ZLA'I STENG, ,RTZA BA'I BLA MA MJAL DU RNAM PA CAN, ,CHOS 'CHANG MNYAM BZHAG STENG DU TSE BUM BSNAMS, ,CHOS GOS GSUM GSOL GSER MDO PAn ZHVA MDZES, ,]
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(ZHES SOGS KYIS SMON LAM GTAB PO, TSUL 'DI YANG 'GRO 'DREN DAM PA MKHAR SNGON THAM GA BLA MA CHOS SKYABS TE YANG TSI'I SPRUL SKU'I PHYAG GA-YOG PA DGE BSGOS YE SHES DNGOS GRUB DANG, GNYE RAB YE SHES BSTAN 'DZIN GNYIS KYIS 'DOD MOS BZHIN KU S'A LI ^DHARMA BADZRA GYIS SBYAR BA'O,, ,,)
